department.dept_long_name: Department of Romance Languages and Literatures

course.title: Images of Brazil: Contemporary Brazilian Cinema
course.faculty_text: Clemence Jouet-Pastre and members of the Department
course.description: Examines major Brazilian films in their historical, political, and social context. Class discussion also focuses on documentaries, reviews, and critical articles. In-depth textual and grammatical analysis, vocabulary building, reflections on the similarities and differences of the oral and written Portuguese will lead students to achieve a high level of competency.
course.prerequisites: Portuguese C, 30, 37, or permission of course head.
course.notes: Conducted in Portuguese. May not be taken Pass/Fail, but may be taken Sat/Unsat by GSAS students. Not open to auditors. Section on-line on the Portuguese 40 website.
